attributes.title: Fallout 4 In Real Life
attributes.caption: Gavin and Michael are stranded in an open world wasteland and their only hope is to find the code to Vault 619.

attributes.title: Fallout 4 In Real Life - The Finale

attributes.title: Five Nights at Freddy's In Real Life
attributes.caption: Would being trapped inside a tiny room, watching lovable characters roaming dimly lit hallways actually be scary? Watch to find out how many nights Michael and Gavin can survive.

attributes.title: Metal Gear Solid in Real Life - Behind the Scenes
attributes.caption: ​The cast and crew of Immersion have found themselves lost in an abandoned warehouse with nothing but an abundant supply of boxes and limited supply of wits.
attributes.description: The cast and crew of Immersion have found themselves lost in an abandoned warehouse with nothing but an abundant supply of boxes and limited supply of wits. As the days drag on some find themselves drawn to a more base nature while others hold onto the facade of civilization, causing a rift between friends as two separate factions arise. The strong prey on the weak and the weak prey on the boxes. Spoilers: The whole thing is a strange metaphor for purgatory.Check out the Original Episode, and Sponsor Edition!
attributes.display_title: Metal Gear Solid in Real Life - Behind the Scenes

attributes.title: Space Invaders In Real Life – Featuring Barbara and Lindsay
